title: Spacious Townhome, Solar, Wood Flooring, 2C Garage With Charger!
posting_body: Beautiful Townhome, Solar, A/C, 15 Years New, Very Spacious, 2c Garage, EV charger
41 Esfahan Drive, San Jose, CA  95111 (Monterey/Curtner)  Spacious townhome 15 years new with 2 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and a 2 car tandem garage + 2 additional onsite parking spaces by permit.
The home also features solar, dual master bedrooms, a formal dining area, and a gorgeous kitchen.
Newer recessed lighting, smart switches and ceiling fans.
The kitchen includes granite counters and stainless steel appliances including a french door refrigerator and gas range.
The master bedroom highlights a large room with a walk-in closet, dual sinks, and a separate stall shower and large bathtub.
The complex is across the street from a park with a playground and basketball court.
The home is also located near The Plant, shopping, dining, banks, grocery store, highway 87 and Cal-trains.
No Pets except required service animals.
